means: 不合身的，不相配的，难看的

sentence.Network_en: She was wearing an unbecoming shade of purple.
sentence.Network_cn: 她穿着一身不相配的紫色衣服。

sentence.Network_en: It is utterly unbecoming of him to do such a thing.
sentence.Network_cn: 干这种事与他的身分极不相称.

sentence.Network_en: Such honour is unbecoming to [ for ] him.
sentence.Network_cn: 这种荣誉对他不 相称.

PerfectNetExp.abs: GRE词汇精选（核心词汇） ... unanimous 全体意见一致的 unbecoming 不合身的；不得体的 unbend 弄直；放松.

GRE词汇精选（核心词汇） ... unanimous 全体意见一致的 unbecoming 不合身的；不得体的 unbend 弄直；放松.

list.abs: when he did something which I feel is unbecoming of an elder brother , I do not have the right to be disappointed.I could only blame myself for being silly and naive .当他做了某件我觉得我心目中的大哥不应该做的事情，那我也没资格去失望了，只能怨自己无聊兼无知。
He was accused of conduct unbecoming to an officer ., 他被谴责行为有失官员身分.
an unbecoming dress , style , colour ., 不合适的连衣裙 , 样式 , 颜色.
It was thought unbecoming for young ladies to smoke ., 年轻女子吸烟被认为有欠斯文.

entry.def: If you describe things such as clothes as unbecoming, you mean that they look unattractive.

example.ex: ...the unbecoming dress hurriedly stitched from cheap cloth.
example.tran: 用廉价布料匆匆缝制的难看的连衣裙

entry.tran: 不得体的；不合宜的；不恰当的
entry.def: If you describe a person's behaviour or remarks as unbecoming, you mean that they are shocking and unsuitable for that person.

example.ex: His conduct was totally unbecoming to an officer in the British armed services...
example.tran: 作为一名英军军官，他的行为极不得体。

example.ex: Those involved had performed acts unbecoming of university students.
example.tran: 那些参与者的所作所为有失大学生的体面。

means.word_mean: 1. considered inappropriate for or unattractive on a particular person;
2. not in keeping with accepted standards of what is right or proper in polite society;

auth_sentence.content: For a scientist, this is most definitely conduct unbecoming.
auth_sentence.res_content: For a scientist, this is most definitely conduct unbecoming.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: For a scientist, this is most definitely conduct unbecoming.

auth_sentence.content: I am aware that my horror is both unbecoming and untraditional.
auth_sentence.res_content: I am aware that my horror is both unbecoming and untraditional.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I am aware that my horror is both unbecoming and untraditional.

auth_sentence.content: An unbecoming pale blue swimsuit that exposed her thin, limp legs.
auth_sentence.res_content: An unbecoming pale blue swimsuit that exposed her thin, limp legs.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: An unbecoming pale blue swimsuit that exposed her thin, limp legs.
